page.title: 07EMPLOYMENT
page.content: {EMPLOYMENT} We believe that the community here was formed because of the fertile land. There were two large estates with farms which provided jobs for many people.A century ago the village of {Stenton}had a {butcher,a baker,a - {grocer,a cobbler,a blacksmith,a pub, {a tailor,weavers,a postoffice and a {carrier. { }Apart from the{postoffice}and the {pub}all these local businesses have disappeared but{farming}is still the main sourse of employment.The estates employ only gardeners and gamekeepers. There are two people still employed in the ancient craft of{"dyking"}the building of walls with dry stones. There are three local industries apart from{farming,Torness Nuclear {power station,Portland cement works} and{Belhaven brewery.
